name: CubeShip
description:
Destroy enemies to get materials to upgrade your ship, and try to reach and destroy the final boss!

Use the mouse to aim and left mouse button to fire. Use the WASD keys to move your ship. The space key fires a pulse of lightning once unlocked.

This "Launch Game" style project is in development, and feedback is much appreciated. I plan to use the same ship stats with other levels with different gameplay to make things more interesting, different planets to explore, etc.
